title: The Structural ambiguity in news headlines in the Jakarta Post
abstract: The thesis is the study of the structural ambiguity in news headlines in The Jakarta Post. The importance of headlines and the effect of ambiguous news headlines on readers make the writer interested in this study. The writer wants to analyse the structurally ambiguous news headlines in term of the structures and meanings. The writer also tries to figure out how to clarify the structurally ambiguous headlines. The analysis is done using the theory of Transformational Grammar. The analysis and findings show that there is structural ambiguity in news headlines in The Jakarta Post. The structural ambiguity in news headlines in The Jakarta Post occurs in noun phrases and sentence with adverbial of place.
